name: Pavlov VR
description:
Pavlov is a multiplayer shooter for the HTC Vive.
FeaturesDedicated Servers
Competitive Search And Destroy game mode
Casual fast-paced game modes
Bots
Matchmaking
Offline/Practice mode
Voice Chat
Touchpad and OOB locomotion
OOB LocomotionOOB stands for "out of body", a teleport variation without actually teleporting, your "avatar" moves into the target location while you snap every half a second to it. This works great for people who are prone to motion sickness without breaking the game for other people, this means you can play with regular players.
